title: Croatia Three Month Interbank Rate (Zibor)
description: Croatia Three Month Interbank Rate (Zibor) was at 0.18 percent on Wednesday November 9. Interbank Rate in Croatia averaged 4.65 percent from 1997 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 16.96 percent in July of 1998 and a record low of 0.10 percent in January of 2016. In Croatia, the interbank rate is the rate of interest charged on short-term loans made between banks. This page provides - Croatia Overnight Interbank Rate - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Croatian National Bank
